allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SIS for contingency tables with fixed margins

Numba-accelerated sequential importance sampling following
Chen, Diaconis, Holmes, and Liu \(2005, JASA\), with a test
reproducing the Diaconis-Gangolli \(1995\) counting result.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
